name: Dansk 08
description: Dansk is a Scandinavian brand of home furnishings that was popular in the sixties. Typical of the fifties and sixties, the furnishing was clean and smooth. The art of that period was also very colorful. I started drawing with markers when I was twelve. With an artist mother, art is a part of my DNA. I did the Dansk series in 2018 and never posted it or tried to sell it. It sat on my computer until now. With the advent of NFT's, I went through my work and decided to show the series first. I've minted the series on Hicketnunc, and they will be featured in a London virtual gallery in Oct.
